entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: ENE 34 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow early in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
